page.title: 02Midpark Area
page.content:
The Midpark Area is mainly grazing land but it has a few areas of deciduous trees. There are no farms.
TRANSPORT: The A713 is the Castle Douglas to Ayr road and runs through the centre of the area. There is a bus service twice a day that goes to Ayr. A disused railway runs parallel to the road. It was closed down twenty years ago. Since then the road has become busier especially during the holidays.
LAND USE: The land is used mainly for sheep and beef cattle grazing. There are no crops growing in the area because the farms have more suitable land outside the area.
